title: Dangerous Love
description: He's ruthless. She's unwilling. But neither can escape the marriage that binds them.Hector Diego Chavez is determined to rise in the mafia world, and Alexis O'Conner is just another pawn in his game. But she refuses to bow to the man who now owns her.In a world of power, betrayal, and deadly desire, will she become his weakness—or his greatest obsession?𝘼𝙧𝙧𝙖𝙣𝙜𝙚𝙙 𝙈𝙖𝙧𝙧𝙞𝙖𝙜𝙚𝘿𝙖𝙧𝙠 𝙇𝙤𝙫𝙚𝙀𝙧𝙤𝙩𝙞𝙘 𝙍𝙤𝙢𝙖𝙣𝙘𝙚𝙏𝙤𝙪𝙘𝙝 𝙃𝙚𝙧 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝘿𝙞𝙚𝙈𝙖𝙛𝙞𝙖𝙃𝙚 𝙁𝙖𝙡𝙡𝙨 𝙁𝙞𝙧𝙨𝙩
author: Jasmine Rov
